title: shrI vishvanAtham bhajEham
sahitya:
(rAgA:  shrI)   
shrI vishvanAtham bhajEham.  rAgamAlikA.  Adi tALA.  
			(rAgA:  shrI)


1:  shrI vishvanAtham bhajEham 
			(svarasAhitya)
caturdasha bhuvana rUpa rAgamAlikAbharaNa dharaNAnta karaNam
 caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  Arabhi)Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  shrita jana samsAra bhItyApaham 
			(svarasAhitya)
AdhyAtmikAdi tApatraya mano bhItyApaham
 caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  gauri)Aa:S R1 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 D1 P M1 G3 R1 S  shrI vishAlAkSI gaurIsham 
			(svarasAhitya)
sakala niSkala rUpa saccidAnanda maya gaurIsham
 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  nATa)Aa:S R3 G3 M1 P D3 N3 S  Av:  S N3 P M1 R3 S  citra vishvanATaka prakAsham 
			(svarasAhitya)
jagat prakAshaka bhAskara shashAnka koTi koTi prakAsham
 caraNam 5  			(rAgA:  gaula)Aa:S R1 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 P M1 R1 G3 M1 R1 S  govindAdi vinuta gaulANgam kSIra kunda indu karpurAdi vi
 caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  mohana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  jaya bhasita uddhULita gaulAngam guruguha sammohanakara lingam
(svarasAhitya)
pancIkrta panca mahA bhUta prapancAdi mohanakara lingam
			(svarasAhitya - mohana)
virinci viSNu rudra mUrTi mayam
			(svarasAhitya - gaula)
viSaya pancaka rahitam abhayam
			(svarasAhitya - nATa)
niratishayA sukhada nipuNataram
			(svarasAhitya - gauri)
nigama sAram Ishvaram amaram
			(svarasAhitya - Arabhi)
smaraharam paramashivam atulam
			(svarasAhitya - shrI)
sarasa sadaya hrdaya nilayam
At this point sing the pallavi and then the following:
 caraNam 7  			(rAgA:  sAma)Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  sadAshivam sAma gAna vinutam 
			(svarasAhitya)
prakrtyAdi sapta rUpa sAmagAna vinutam
 caraNam 8  			(rAgA:  lalita)Aa:S R1 G3 M1 D1 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D1 M1 G3 R1 S  sanmAtram lalita hrdaya viditam 
			(svarasAhitya)
kAma krodhAdi rahita lalita hrdaya viditam
 caraNam 9  			(rAgA:  bhairava)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  cidAkasha bharavam puraharam 
			(svarasAhitya)
vidhi kapAla trishUladhara bhairavam puraharam
 caraNam 10  			(rAgA:  sAranga)Aa:S R2 G3 M2 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M2 R2 G3 M1 R2 S  citsabhEshvaram sArangadharam 
			(svarasAhitya)
dArukAvana tapodhana kalpita sArangadharam
 caraNam 11  			(rAgA:  shankarAbharaNa)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  sadA AshrayAmi shankarAbharaNam 
			(svarasAhitya)
cintitArtha vitaraNam dhurINatara mANikya maya shankarAbharaNam
1 caraNam 2  (rAgA:  kAmbhoji)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S N3 P D2 S  sadgati dAyaka ambhoja caraNam 
			(svarasAhitya)
dharmArthadi nikhila puruSArtha prada samarthatara ambhoja caraNam
1 caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  dEvakriyA)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 N P M1 G2 R2 S  vadAnya devakriyA khelanam srSti sthiti vilaya tirodhAna anugraha karaNa kriyA khelanam
1 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  bhUpALa)Aa:S R1 G2 P D1 S  Av:  S D1 P G2 R1 S  vaidyalinga bhUpAla pAlanam shrIpura nirrti bhAga gart tIra sthita vara bhUpAla pAlanam
			(vilOma -bhUpAla)
1 caraNam 4    guruguhesha suranaresham anisham
			(vilOma - dEvakriyA)
1 caraNam 3    kuja budhAdi graha gati vihitam
			(vilOma - kAmbhoji)
1 caraNam 2    varadam anala ravi shashi nayanam
			(vilOma - shankarAbharaNa)
 caraNam 11    vanaja candra sannibha vadanam
			(viloma - sAranga)
 caraNam 10    paramahamsam Anandanartanam
			(vilOma - bhairava)
 caraNam 9    patita pAvana karaNam mada haraNam
			(vilOma - lalita)
 caraNam 8    parataram parama manolaya jayam
			(vilOma - sAma)
 caraNam 7    parAdi vAk prakAsha Anandamayam
